dmidecode	3.6	Tool for dumping DMI (SMBIOS) contents in human-readable format	FreeBSD:14:amd64	sysutils/dmidecode
gettext-runtime	0.23.1	GNU gettext runtime libraries and programs	FreeBSD:14:amd64	devel/gettext-runtime
indexinfo	0.3.1_1	Utility to regenerate the GNU info page index	FreeBSD:14:amd64	print/indexinfo
libidn2	2.3.8	Implementation of IDNA2008 internationalized domain names	FreeBSD:14:amd64	dns/libidn2
liblz4	1.10.0,1	LZ4 compression library, lossless and very fast	FreeBSD:14:amd64	archivers/liblz4
libnghttp2	1.67.0	HTTP/2 C Library	FreeBSD:14:amd64	www/libnghttp2
libpsl	0.21.5_2	C library to handle the Public Suffix List	FreeBSD:14:amd64	dns/libpsl
libssh2	1.11.1,3	Library implementing the SSH2 protocol	FreeBSD:14:amd64	security/libssh2
libunistring	1.4.1	Unicode string library	FreeBSD:14:amd64	devel/libunistring
pkg	2.3.1	Package manager	FreeBSD:14:amd64	ports-mgmt/pkg
sudo	1.9.17p2	Allow others to run commands as root	FreeBSD:14:amd64	security/sudo

$ pkg query -a '%n\t%v\t%c\t%q\t%o'
